content.p: Delivering lectures? Discover the IT and audio visual equipment that can enrich your teaching experience. Read our room guidance pages for support with how to use the facilities and equipment in centrally timetabled rooms: Teaching space guidance Book a room Campus IT support teams maintain centrally timetabled rooms that are equipped with IT and audio visual systems, including: A desktop computer Interactive smart screens BluRay/DVD player Presentation audio system Connections for a laptop Engage (Echo360) lecture recording Microsoft Teams Microsoft Surface Hubs For more information about teaching, learning, and assessment technologies, visit the educational excellence website: Teaching and learning systems Please use the telephone numbers that are provided in each room, or as listed on the Campus IT support page: Campus IT support If you're struggling please get in touch with the team Submit and track requests to solve your IT issues Updates on the University's core IT services
